HOME.title: Welcome to the new era of Learning
HOME.subtitle: Join the future of education with our user-friendly e-learning platform designed for the University of Barcelona.

LOGIN.card_text: You can sign in or access with your existing account.
LOGIN.in_case_register: In case you do not have an account already

REGISTER.select_objective: Please select at least one objective and categorize it
REGISTER.password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long
REGISTER.card_text: Register now and start acquiring new knowledge with our online courses.Learning has never been easier!
REGISTER.in_case: In case you have an account already
REGISTER.name: Name

objectives_register.title: One last step...
objectives_register.subtitle: Add some personalization to your profile and set your goals!
objectives_register.add_brief_description: Add a brief description about yourself
objectives_register.text_goals_1: Learning with a MOOC can be challenging. This tool supports you to achieve your goals. Here you can (1) actively set your goal for this course and (2) select indicators to monitor your progress towards your goal.
objectives_register.text_goals_title: What do you want to achieve by the end of this course?
objectives_register.text_goals_2: Some examples for a goal are learning specific topics covered by the course, completing the course and getting a certificate, completing all activities in the course in a certain timeframe, dedicating 3 hours weekly to this course, etc.
objectives_register.text_goals_title_2: How would you categorize your objectives ?
objectives_register.text_goals_3: You can select one or more categories that best describe your objectives. This will help you to monitor your progress and help you to achieve your goals.

PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_length: Password must be between 8 and 20 characters.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_digit: Password must contain at least one digit.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_special_character: Password must contain at least one special character.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.sent_email: We've sent you an email to {{email}} with a link to reset your password.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_recovery_sub: Recover the password for your associated account.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_enter: Enter a new password for your account.
PASSWORD_RECOVERY.password_text: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

OBJECTIVES_CONSTANT.linked_objectives: This task is linked with your objectives!

criteria: Ability for self-criticism and critical thinking
Ability to demonstrate attitudes consistent with ethical and deontological principles
Ability for analysis, synthesis, global perspectives, and practical applications of knowledge
Ability to make decisions and adapt to new situations
Ability to collaborate with others and contribute to a common project
Ability to collaborate in interdisciplinary and multicultural teams
Ability to formulate, design, and manage projects
Ability to seek and integrate new knowledge and attitudes
Ability to assess the social and environmental impact of actions in their field
Ability to express integrated and systematic visions
Ability to understand and express oneself orally and in writing in Catalan and Spanish and in another language, using specialized language in the discipline
Ability to search, use, and integrate information

BUG_REPORT.bug_report_text: Use this form to report any bugs or issues you encounter on the app.
BUG_REPORT.bug_description_placeholder: Please add as much detail as possible.

HELP.title: Let us know how we can help
HELP.text: Weâ€™re here to help and answer any question you might have, We look forward to hearing from you! Please fill out the form, or use the contact information below.

ETHICAL_COMMITMENT.title: Ethical commitment
ETHICAL_COMMITMENT.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to criticize yourself and think critically? Are you able to demonstrate attitudes consistent with ethical and deontological principles?

CREATIVE_CAPACITY.title: Creative and entrepreneurial capacity
CREATIVE_CAPACITY.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to formulate, design, and manage projects? Are you able to seek and integrate new knowledge and attitudes?

SUSTAINABILITY.title: Sustainability
SUSTAINABILITY.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to assess the social and environmental impact of actions in your field? Are you able to express integrated and systematic visions?

COMMUNICATIVE_ABILITY.title: Communicative ability
COMMUNICATIVE_ABILITY.description: Before completing this objective, think over the following questions: Are you able to understand and express yourself orally and in writing in Catalan and Spanish and in another language, using specialized language in the discipline? Are you able to search, use, and integrate information?

SELF_ASSESSMENT.title: Self-assessment Rubric
SELF_ASSESSMENT.description: Define the criteria on the rubric for evaluating the process and progression of the task.
SELF_ASSESSMENT.placeholder_1: Enter Evaluation 1, e.g.: I was unable to listen when my teacher gave directions.
SELF_ASSESSMENT.placeholder_2: Enter Evaluation 2, e.g.: I needed more than 2 prompts to listen whan my teacher gave directions.
SELF_ASSESSMENT.placeholder_3: Enter Evaluation 3, e.g.: I needed 1-2 prompts to listen whan my teacher gave directions.
SELF_ASSESSMENT.placeholder_4: Enter Evaluation 4, e.g.: I listened when my teacher gave directions.

PLANNING_QUESTIONNAIRE.title: Planning Questionnaire
PLANNING_QUESTIONNAIRE.description: A planning questionnaire is a valuable tool for gathering essential information to create effective plans. This questionnaire helps individuals or teams define goals, identify resources, and establish a roadmap for successful execution.

SRL_O_QUESTIONNAIRE.title: SRL-O Self-regulation Questionnaire
SRL_O_QUESTIONNAIRE.description: The Self-regulation for learning online (SRL-O) questionnaire measures the frequency and quality of learning strategies when applied to online or blended or hybrid environments.

TASK_STATEMENT.title: Task Statement
TASK_STATEMENT.description: Define the essential details of the task, including its objectives, scope, and expected outcomes. Task statements are designed to provide clear guidance to individuals or teams, ensuring that they understand their responsibilities and can execute the task effectively.

EMPTY_QUESTIONNAIRE.title: Empty Questionnaire
EMPTY_QUESTIONNAIRE.description: Create a new questionnaire from scratch.

THINK_ALOUD.title: Think Aloud
THINK_ALOUD.description: A Think Aloud is a strategy where you verbalize your thoughts as you work through a problem or task. It helps students understand your reasoning process and learn effective problem-solving strategies.

SELF_ASSESSMENT.title: Self-assessment
SELF_ASSESSMENT.description: Self-assessment is a process that allows students to reflect on their learning, identify areas of strength and weakness, and set goals for improvement. It is an essential skill for lifelong learning and personal development.

CUSTOM_FIELD.title: Custom Field
CUSTOM_FIELD.description: Add a custom field if you need to introduce any theoretical subsection between phases.

TASK_IMPLEMENTATION.title: Task Implementation
TASK_IMPLEMENTATION.description: Implementation of the task, during this phase, the planned tasks and activities are put into action. It involves carrying out the necessary actions to achieve the project or task objectives defined in the planning phase.

PEER_REVIEW.title: Peer Review
PEER_REVIEW.description: This review method aims to provide constructive feedback, validate the quality and accuracy of the work, and ensure it meets established standards or criteria.

FORUM_DEBATE.title: Forum Debate
FORUM_DEBATE.description: The forum debate is a discussion forum where students can share their opinions, ask questions, and engage in debates on a specific topic. It is an excellent way to encourage critical thinking, collaboration, and communication skills.

EMPTY.title: Empty Questionnaire
EMPTY.description: Create a new questionnaire from scratch.

PLANNING.title: Planning Questionnaire
PLANNING.description: The planning questionnaire is a valuable tool for gathering essential information to create effective plans. This questionnaire helps individuals or teams define goals, identify resources, and establish a roadmap for successful execution.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION_1: What is your primary objective for this task?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_2: How would you rate your current knowledge level on the topic?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_3: What specific subtopics are you planning to focus on?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_4: How do you plan to gather information for your research?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_5: What time frame have you set for completing this task?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_6: What strategies do you plan to use for self-regulated learning during this task?

SELF_ASSESSMENT.title: Self-assessment Questionnaire
SELF_ASSESSMENT.description: The self-assessment questionnaire is a valuable tool for evaluating your performance on a task or project. It helps you reflect on your strengths and weaknesses, identify areas for improvement, and set goals for future development.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION_1: Did I achieve the task's objectives?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_2: Was the quality of my work satisfactory?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_3: Did I manage my time effectively?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_4: Did I handle the task's challenges well?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_5: Was my communication clear and effective?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_6: Did I collaborate well with others?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_7: Did I demonstrate creativity or innovation?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_8: What did I learn from this task?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_9: How can I improve in the future?
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_10: Overall, how satisfied am I with my performance?

SRLO.title: SRL-O Self-regulation Questionnaire
SRLO.description: The Self-regulation for learning online (SRL-O) questionnaire measures the frequency and quality of learning strategies when applied to online or blended or hybrid environments.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION_1: I am confident that I will be able to master the content and assignments in this online class.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_2: I am confident in my ability to successfully persist in this online class, even if I find the content difficult.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_3: I am confident I can put in the effort required to get a high grade in this online class.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_4: I am confident that I can accurately work out what the task is requiring me to do.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_5: I always find aspects of the content that arouse my curiosity.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_6: I love learning new things in this online class.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_7: I find studying for this online class enjoyable.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_8: I find it very satisfying when I learn new material in this online course.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_9: I get a sense of achievement when I learn new skills or information.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_10: I want to do well in this online course so I can show off to my friends and family.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_11: I want to do well because of others' real or perceived expectations of me.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_12: I want to get a better grade than others in my online class.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_13: I feel so helpless that I cannot dedicate all my effort to my online studies.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_14: While studying, I want to distract myself to lower my anxiety level.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_15: I get so anxious that I don't even want to start studying online.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_16: When I have to study online, I start to feel bad.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_17: I set short-term (daily or weekly) goals.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_18: I set realistic deadlines for learning.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_19: I break larger goals into smaller actionable goals.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_20: I make a list of detailed actions that I need to complete.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_21: I plan out my schedule each week so I have the appropriate amount of time available for online study.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_22: I think about what learning strategies have worked for me in the past when doing similar assignments/types of study.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_23: I spend time trying to interpret the task to ensure I understand accurately what I need to do.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_24: I look over past feedback I have received and check that I have made improvements in my current learning.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_25: I think about how I might improve my work by evaluating it against the marking criteria provided by the teacher.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_26: I am able to study for my online course without distraction.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_27: I have access to a quiet and distraction-free place to study.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_28: I know where I can study most efficiently for this online course.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_29: I work hard in my online study, even when there are more interesting things to do.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_30: When my online study gets difficult, I remain committed to reaching my study goals.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_31: When my mind begins to wander during a learning session for this online course, I make a special effort to keep concentrating.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_32: No matter how I am feeling, I persevere with my online study.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_33: I try to help other students when they ask a question online, I can answer.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_34: I ask for help from knowledgeable others through online channels when I am not sure what to do in my online class.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_35: I ask the teacher and/or my peers to clarify information in my online course.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_36: When I have difficulties with my online class, I seek assistance from others through online means (discussion boards, social media, email, instant messaging etc.).
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_37: I use email, discussion boards, social media, etc., to connect with the teacher and other students when I need help.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_38: When studying online, I create my own examples of the content to make it more meaningful.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_39: When studying online, I organise my thoughts by making summaries of what I am learning.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_40: When studying online, I try and relate the content to what I already know.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_41: When learning the online content, I try and develop my own ideas about it.
QUESTIONS.QUESTION_42: I try and improve my understanding by doing additional work beyond the core content (e.g., doing extra problem-solving activities or extra readings).

CONTINUOUS_FEEDBACK.title: Continuous feedback
CONTINUOUS_FEEDBACK.description: The sequence is designed to revolve around the delivery of a task, allowing students to plan the task and progressively improve it with feedback from other students.

FORUM_FEEDBACK.title: Develop a task with forum feedback
FORUM_FEEDBACK.description: The sequence is designed to revolve around the delivery of a task, with the possibility of receiving feedback from other students through the forum.

CONTINUOUS_FEEDBACK_2.title: Continuous feedback
CONTINUOUS_FEEDBACK_2.description: The sequence is designed to revolve around the delivery of a task, allowing students to plan the task and progressively improve it with feedback from other students with a more continuous delivery system.

EARLY_FEEDBACK.title: Early Professor feedback and reflection
EARLY_FEEDBACK.description: The sequence is designed to revolve around the delivery of a task, allowing students to plan the task and receive feedback from the professor before the final delivery.

peerReviewGroup.instruction: For the example below, we would select; A2-A8 (in the student case), B2-B8 (Qualification case), C2-C8 (Comment case), and D2-D8 (Grade from peer review):
peerReviewGroup.note: When ' - ' is displayed in 'Average grade peer review' it means that peer review was not evaluated numerically and only professor qualification will be taken into account.

SELFASSESTMENT.self_assessment_text_prof: See how your students have evaluated themselves.
SELFASSESTMENT.rubric_text: Thoroughly read the criteria outlined in the rubric. Take some time to reflect on your project and assess how well it meets each of the outlined criteria.
SELFASSESTMENT.rubric_text2: Now that you have reviewed the rubric, use it to self-evaluate your project. Consider each criterion carefully and assess how well your project fulfills the requirements. After reflecting on these aspects, assign a grade to your project.
SELFASSESTMENT.add_your_comments: Add your comments about your project.
SELFASSESTMENT.evaluate_1_10: Evaluate your project with a score from 1 to 10.
